sentences.en: a cluster of stars
sentences.cn: 星团

sentences.en: A cluster of tourists was surrounded in the hill.
sentences.cn: 一群游客被困在了山中.

sentences.en: A cluster of vultures crouched on the carcass of a dead buffalo.
sentences.cn: 一群秃鹫蹲伏在一具野牛的尸体上。

sentences.en: a diamond cluster ring
sentences.cn: 群镶钻戒

sentences.en: A generalized model for cluster formation of arsenic atoms has been derived.
sentences.cn: 砷原子生成聚集群团的一般模型已经导出.

sentences.en: Businessmen cluster together to get ideas, tips, personal contacts anything to get a step ahead of the computer.
sentences.cn: 商人们聚集在一起寻求创意、建议、人际关系等，以便能比计算机领先一步。

sentences.en: Chinese waiters stood in a cluster, sharing a private joke.
sentences.cn: 华人服务生们站在一起，讲着只有他们自己才懂的笑话。

sentences.en: Do this for all nodes in the cluster.
sentences.cn: 对集群中的所有节点都这样做。

sentences.en: Each atomic cluster is made up of neutrons and protons.
sentences.cn: 原子簇是由中子和质子构成的。

sentences.en: Here's how I'd cluster the story we just skimmed.
sentences.cn: 现在我就把我们刚才浏览的故事组群如下.

sentences.en: However, there are some problems in the cluster environment.
sentences.cn: 然而，在集群环境中却存在一些问题。

sentences.en: She held a cluster of flowers in her arms.
sentences.cn: 她抱着一束鲜花.

sentences.en: She placed a towel on a cluster of rocks just clear of the tidemark.
sentences.cn: 她把一条毛巾放在刚没过涨潮线的一堆石头上。

sentences.en: The children clustered together in the corner of the room.
sentences.cn: 孩子们聚集在房间的角落里。

sentences.en: The illustration shows a cluster of five roses coloured apricot orange.
sentences.cn: 插图上是一簇杏橙色的玫瑰，一共5朵。

sentences.en: The passengers clustered together in small groups.
sentences.cn: 乘客们聚集成小群体。

sentences.en: The stars in each given cluster presumably were formed almost simultaneously.
sentences.cn: 大体上说,每个给定星团中的恒星差不多是同时形成的.

sentences.en: There was a little cluster of admirers around the actress.
sentences.cn: 女演员周围拥着一小群崇拜者.

sentences.en: There was a little cluster of admirers round the guest speaker.
sentences.cn: 有一小群仰慕者围着那位特邀嘉宾.

sentences.en: This can be done on any server of the cluster.
sentences.cn: 可以在集群的任何服务器中这样做。

sentences.en: Two cars smashed together and a cluster of rubbernecks gathered around.
sentences.cn: 两辆汽车相撞,一群好奇的人围拢起来观看.

words.tran_cn: 使聚集；聚集在某人的周围

phrases.tran_cn: 丛集性头痛；组合性头痛；头痛群
分组取样；类集抽样；巢式抽样法
基因簇，一组相同或者相似的基因
室女座星系团；处女座星系团

trans.tran_en: a group of things of the same kind that are very close together
to come together in a small group or groups
If people cluster together, they gather together in a small group
if a group of people or things cluster somewhere, or are clustered somewhere, they form a small group in that place
